title: Personality and probabilistic thinking: an exploratory study
abstract: Examines the relationship between personality measures and probabilistic thinking. Definition of probabilistic thinking; Results indicating a lack of significant relationship between probabilistic thinking and authoritarianism, conservatism, dogmatism and intolerance of ambiguity
